title: Spigot 如何获取服务器全部玩家转为List<Player>
txt_content:
如题，已经用getServer().getOnlinePlayer()获取到了CollectionCollection<? extends Player>如何转换为List<Player>
试了很多办法都不行，求大佬，谢谢！

replies.author: 夏雨吖
replies.txt_content:

List<Player> list1 = new ArrayList<>(getOnlinePlayers());
List<Player> list2 = new LinkedList<>(getOnlinePlayers());

replies.author: Time_Traveller
replies.txt_content:
List<Player> list = Lists.newArrayList();
for (Player p:Bukkit.getOnlinePlayers()) list.add(p);

Billy12345 发表于 2020-3-16 07:24
new ArrayList(getOnlinePlayers())不就结了吗
解决啦，感谢！
